column4: I understand it's good tendencies to be patient when asking a question, but i'm looking for a quick fix on faster tranfer rate when using the cp command.  If no one has any ideas that come to mind instantly I'll move on.  I'm not trying to sound like a jerk, but i'm really in a hurry
so you expect 1644 users to say "sry no idea"?
sandisk u3? unbelievable slow here too.
i've been looking for months.  And I've been on Linux for years so I'm looking for a reason explanation on why this task takes time
